channel.title: DawnScape Reborn
channel.description:
Hello everyone I'm making this thread to inform you guys of a new project I'm going to start soon. Which I need a development team for. This project will include things that Runescape has, but tweaked to make it so players can have the best gaming experience. By that I mean no low experience rate but moderate, no customs such as rainbow colored party-hats. I used to play RuneScape but just as everyone quit and than rejoined and so on and so forth. I permantly quit after almost reaching my goal of a party hat. Only 20m away I was hacked. Which is why I'm here to re-create my own version of RuneScape.
Features of skills unique to this project are Below are the skills that will be 100% and will be perfected with the features ed besides it. This includes random events for all of these skills.
100% Thieving, An Npc around you will have a chance to attack you when caught Current 50% 100% Woodcutting, with nests, being able to break your axe.Current 60% 100% Fishing, Timing it perfectly, and fishing spots that move.Current 60% 100% Combat Perfect timing, perfect food eating, and flawless combat systemCurrent 80% 100% Farming, No instant growth but maybe 10 minutes, bug free.Current 40% 100% Summoning with oblesk, charms, Current 75% 100% Slayer, with slayer helmet, black masks, level requirementsCurrent 20% 85% Dungeoneering mostly because it would be a time horde.Current 0% 100% Smithing, Good timing, and correct interfaces.Current 60% 100% Mining able to break axe,Current 50% 100% Hunter Implings all over the server, not in certain spotsCurrent 60% 100% Firemaking, correct timingCurrent 50% 100% Agility, full course in real runescape locationCurrent 50% 100% RunecraftingCurrent 50% 100% Prayer, bones on altar is multipliedCurrent 20% 100% Crafting,Current 50% 100% Herblore, correct requirementsCurrent 10% 100% Cooking, with chances of being burnt raised as your level raises.Current 70% /
I would also like these other features,
Bosses with correct hitpoints, forms, and level Bosses in correct locations Monsters having correct constant drops with edited rare drops No more commands, but Npcs when talked to do the commands for you Teleports don't teleport to bosses directly, but into the general area More Npc with player dialogue Custom Tutorial like that of deadlypkers /
Inside Features
Fixed Deadlock Fixed Memory leaks Login Filter Chat Filter Yell Filter Custom Yell In-game Reporting working Dupes Fixed Exploits Fixed Clipped Following An Achievement system Npcs being able to chat while in combat Possible RuneScape Music All doors fully functional Using Graham's Tick Cycle
Nomad http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JpXuyHsixik&hd=1‪Nomad - DawnSape‬‏ http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dYveSjnHH0U
I'm looking for one possibly two server developers
Two Client Developers
The site and such will be finished later, for now we're using my current forums.
Please post an application in any format please include your experience and why you would like to join.
We will be starting off my current source which has other features not mentioned done.
Client will be a resizable client, with 634 items and Npcs. 508 Maps, 602 animations and 508 Gfx.

item.title: DawnScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

looks decent go into more detail about the achievement system, what type of engine tweaks/edits you have done, what type of networking it has, etc.

Read full topic

item.title: DawnScape Reborn
item.dc:creator: @Pluck Pluck
item.description:
@Pluck wrote:

 Hello everyone I'm making this thread to inform you guys of a new project I'm going to start soon. Which I need a development team for.

This project will include things that Runescape has, but tweaked to make it so players can have the best gaming experience.
By that I mean no low experience rate but moderate, no customs such as rainbow colored party-hats.
I used to play RuneScape but just as everyone quit and than rejoined and so on and so forth. I permantly quit after almost reaching my goal of a party hat. Only 20m away I was hacked. Which is why I’m here to re-create my own version of RuneScape.

Features of skills unique to this project are
Below are the skills that will be 100% and will be perfected with the features ed besides it.
This includes random events for all of these skills.

100% Thieving, An Npc around you will have a chance to attack you when caught Current 50%
100% Woodcutting, with nests, being able to break your axe.Current 60%
100% Fishing, Timing it perfectly, and fishing spots that move.Current 60%
100% Combat Perfect timing, perfect food eating, and flawless combat systemCurrent 80%
100% Farming, No instant growth but maybe 10 minutes, bug free.Current 40%
100% Summoning with oblesk, charms, Current 75%
100% Slayer, with slayer helmet, black masks, level requirementsCurrent 20%
85% Dungeoneering mostly because it would be a time horde.Current 0%
100% Smithing, Good timing, and correct interfaces.Current 60%
100% Mining able to break axe,Current 50%
100% Hunter Implings all over the server, not in certain spotsCurrent 60%
100% Firemaking, correct timingCurrent 50%
100% Agility, full course in real runescape locationCurrent 50%
100% RunecraftingCurrent 50%
100% Prayer, bones on altar is multipliedCurrent 20%
100% Crafting,Current 50%
100% Herblore, correct requirementsCurrent 10%
100% Cooking, with chances of being burnt raised as your level raises.Current 70%
/

I would also like these other features,

Bosses with correct hitpoints, forms, and level
Bosses in correct locations
Monsters having correct constant drops with edited rare drops
No more commands, but Npcs when talked to do the commands for you
Teleports don’t teleport to bosses directly, but into the general area
More Npc with player dialogue
Custom Tutorial like that of deadlypkers
/

Inside Features

Fixed Deadlock
Fixed Memory leaks
Login Filter
Chat Filter
Yell Filter
Custom Yell
In-game Reporting working
Dupes Fixed
Exploits Fixed
Clipped Following
An Achievement system
Npcs being able to chat while in combat
Possible RuneScape Music
All doors fully functional
Using Graham’s Tick Cycle

Nomad
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JpXuyHsixik&hd=1‪Nomad - DawnSape‬‏
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dYveSjnHH0U

I’m looking for one possibly two server developers

Two Client Developers

The site and such will be finished later, for now we’re using my current forums.

Please post an application in any format please include your experience and why you would like to join.

We will be starting off my current source which has other features not mentioned done.

Client will be a resizable client, with 634 items and Npcs.
508 Maps, 602 animations and 508 Gfx.

Read full topic
